name: Shoe Drop
description:
Being president was hard.

Just ask The Don! And it doesn't help when you have to deal with an onslaught of scandals.

Now you get to relive the experience.

Use the arrow keys to move. Catch the shoes before they drop and ruin your presidency!

Catch the conspiracy theories to distract the public from your scandals. Heck, shouting about whatever offensive or meaningless nonsense you can think of will probably work too.

Score enough points to earn a power-up. It can be activated using the space-bar when you’re in a pinch.
